td.content: s:patient presents with moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture, moderate denial of any trauma, moderate recurrent chest pain and Blood. she is having symptoms 1-2 times a week, in spite of treatment. patient is a female tailor aged 25 ys. she denies ever using cigarettes she reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 177 cm, Weight 54.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate denial of any trauma, moderate recurrent chest pain and moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture for 3 weeks. she has a history of Sickle Cell Anemia for past 2 weeks. she is a 25 YO white f. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 53.8 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed fentanyl PCA - 50 mcg/hour IV PCA.

s:a 25 yr old F presents with mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech and mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous. These symptoms are present for about 9 days. she denies ever using cigarettes occasional EtOH o:Height 176 cm, Weight 53.9 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate denial of any trauma, moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture and moderate recurrent chest pain. she is having symptoms 3-5 x day, in spite of treatment. she is a white female aged 26 ys. she does not smoke she reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 176 cm, Weight 53.4 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed fentanyl PCA - 50 mcg/hour IV PCA, and ordered Hemoglobin electrophoresis, Hand XRY.
